entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pinawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pinawa 5:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -29.7°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
